Rule.Description: Only "Tenured/tenure-track faculty" or "Non-tenure-track research faculty" can "Add" a "Whole Proposal"
"Teaching faculty", "Research staff", "Professional staff", "Administrator" cannot "Add" a "Whole Proposal" unless delegated by faculty
"PI" can "Add" "InvestigatorInformation.Co-PI" and Only when SubmittedByPI is NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI is NOTDELETED
"Co-PI" cannot "Add" "InvestigatorInformation.Co-PI" when SubmittedByPI is NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI is NOTDELETED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI is False
"PI" can "Add" "InvestigatorInformation.Senior-Personnel" Only when SubmittedByPI is NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI is NOTDELETED
"Co-PI" can "Add" Only "InvestigatorInformation.Senior-Personnel" when SubmittedByPI is NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI is NOTDELETED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI is False
"Tenured/tenure-track faculty" or "Non-tenure-track research faculty" can "Save" a "Whole Proposal"

AttributeAssignmentExpression.AttributeValue: postobligation

Hello User,

The proposal has been created by Tenured/tenure-track or Non-tenure-track faculty.

Thank you,
GPMS Team
Your proposal has been created by:

Rule.Description: "PI" can "Save" an Existing "Whole Proposal" when SubmittedByPI = NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI = NOTDELETED

AttributeAssignmentExpression.AttributeValue: postobligation

Hello User,

Your proposal has been updated by PI. As soon as possible please review your proposal for any unwanted changes.

Thank you,
GPMS Team
Your proposal has been updated successfully by:

Rule.Description: "Co-PI" can "Save" an Existing "Whole Proposal" when SubmittedByPI = NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI = NOTDELETED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI = False

AttributeAssignmentExpression.AttributeValue: postobligation

Hello User,

Your proposal has been updated by Co-PI. As soon as possible please review your proposal for any unwanted changes.

Thank you,
GPMS Team
Your proposal has been updated successfully by:

Rule.Description: "PI" can "Submit" a "Whole Proposal" when SubmittedByPI = NOTSUBMITTED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI = True and DeletedByPI = NOTDELETED where condition check all Co-PI is signed.

AttributeAssignmentExpression.AttributeValue: preobligation
You need to sign the proposal first!
postobligation

Hello User,

The proposal has been submitted by PI. Now the proposal is waiting for Department Chair approval.

Thank you,
GPMS Team
Your proposal has been submitted by:

Rule.Description: "PI" can not "Submit" a "Whole Proposal" when SubmittedByPI = NOTSUBMITTED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI = True and DeletedByPI = NOTDELETED where condition check all Co-PI is not signed.
"Co-PI" cannpt "Submit" a "Whole Proposal" when SubmittedByPI = NOTSUBMITTED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI = False and DeletedByPI = NOTDELETED

"University Research Administrator" can "Submit" a "Whole Proposal" when SubmittedByUniversityResearchAdministrator = NOTSUBMITTED and ApprovedByUniversityResearchDirector = APPROVED where condition check no IRB is required.

AttributeAssignmentExpression.AttributeValue: preobligation

Rule.Description: "PI" can "View" proposal "Audit Log"
"Co-PI", "Senior Personnel", "Department Chair", "Business Manager", "Dean", "IRB", "University Research Administrator", "University Research Director" cannot "View" proposal "Audit Log"

"PI" can "Edit" "Investigator Information", "InvestigatorInformation.PI", "InvestigatorInformation.Co-PI", "InvestigatorInformation.Senior-Personnel", "Project Information","Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "Certification/Signatures", "Appendices" when SubmittedByPI is NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI is NOTDELETED

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "PI" can not "Edit" "OSP Section"
"Co-PI" can "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Appendices" and "Certification/Signatures" Only when SubmittedByPI is NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI is NOTDELETED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI is False

"Co-PI" can not "Edit" "Project Information","Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information","OSP Section" when SubmittedByPI is NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI is NOTDELETED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI is False

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "Senior Personnel" cannot "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "Certification/Signatures", "OSP Section", "Appendices" Section when SubmittedByPI is NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI is NOTDELETED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI is False

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "Department Chair" can "Edit" "Certification/Signatures" when ApprovedByDepartmentChair = READYFORAPPROVAL

"Department Chair" cannot "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "OSP Section", "Appendices" Section when ApprovedByDepartmentChair = READYFORAPPROVAL

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "Business Manager" can "Edit" "Sponsor and Budget Information" and "Certification/Signatures" when ApprovedByBusinessManager = READYFORAPPROVAL

"Business Manager" cannot "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "OSP Section", "Appendices" Section when ApprovedByBusinessManager = READYFORAPPROVAL

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "Dean" can "Edit" and "Certification/Signatures" when ApprovedByDean = READYFORAPPROVAL

"Dean" cannot "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "OSP Section", "Appendices" Section when ApprovedByDean = READYFORAPPROVAL

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "IRB" can "Edit" and "Certification/Signatures" when ApprovedByIRB = READYFORAPPROVAL

"IRB" cannot "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "OSP Section", "Appendices" Section when ApprovedByIRB = READYFORAPPROVAL

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "University Research Administrator" can "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information", "OSP Section", "Certification/Signatures" Section when ApprovedByUniversityResearchAdministrator = READYFORAPPROVAL

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "University Research Administrator" cannot edit Appendices when ApprovedByUniversityResearchAdministrator = READYFORAPPROVAL
"University Research Director" can edit "Certification/Signatures" and "OSP Section" when ApprovedByUniversityResearchDirector = READYFORAPPROVAL

"University Research Administrator" cannot "Edit" "Investigator Information", "Project Information", "Sponsor and Budget Information", "Cost Share Information", "University Commitments", "Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information", "Compliance Information", "Additional Information", "Collaboration Information", "Proprietary/Confidential Information" "Appendices"Section when ApprovedByUniversityResearchDirector = READYFORAPPROVAL

Match.AttributeValue: Conflict of Interest and Commitment Information

Rule.Description: "PI" can see "Submit" button when SubmittedByPI = NOTSUBMITTED and ReadyForSubmissionByPI = True and DeletedByPI = NOTDELETED

"University Research Administrator" can see "Submit" button when SubmittedByUniversityResearchAdministrator = NOTSUBMITTED and ApprovedByUniversityResearchDirector = APPROVED where condition check no IRB is required.
"PI" can see "Save" and "Delete" button when SubmittedByPI = NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI = NOTDELETED
"Co-PI" can see "Save" button when SubmittedByPI = NOTSUBMITTED and DeletedByPI = NOTDELETED
"University Research Director" can see "Delete" button when ApprovedByUniversityResearchDirector = READYFORAPPROVAL and DeletedByUniversityResearchDirector = NOTDELETED
"University Research Administrator" can see "Withdraw" button when ApprovedByUniversityResearchAdministrator = READYFORAPPROVAL and WithdrawnByUniversityResearchAdministrator = NOTWITHDRAWN
"Department Chair" can see "Approve" and "Disapprove" button when ApprovedByDepartmentChair = READYFORAPPROVAL
"Business Manager" can see "Approve" and "Disapprove" button when ApprovedByBusinessManager = READYFORAPPROVAL
"IRB" can see "Approve" and "Disapprove" button when ApprovedByIRB = READYFORAPPROVAL
"Dean" can see "Approve" and "Disapprove" button when ApprovedByDean = READYFORAPPROVAL
"University Research Administrator" can see "Approve" and "Disapprove" button when ApprovedByUniversityResearchAdministrator = READYFORAPPROVAL
"University Research Director" can see "Approve" and "Disapprove" button when ApprovedByUniversityResearchDirector = READYFORAPPROVAL
"University Research Director" can see "Archive" button when ArchivedByUniversityResearchDirector = NOTARCHIVED and SubmittedByUniversityResearchAdministrator = SUBMITTED
"Department Chair" of "Computer Science" can Delegate "Approve" and "Disapprove" actions to "Associate Chair" from the "Same Department"
"Department Chair" of "Computer Science" can Delegate "Approve" and "Disapprove" actions
"Department Chair" of "Computer Engineering" can Delegate "Approve" and "Disapprove" actions to "Associate Chair" from the "Same Department"
"Department Chair" of "Computer Engineering" can Delegate "Approve" and "Disapprove" actions
